root: ^The scanner didn't show any enemy activity here, but i'll stay alert.
^It'll be good to keep an eye on the radar.
^The ship's mining lazer still just about works. Maybe with that I could regain some resources from some of the smaller asteroids.
^After that nothing else but to carry on going, so I'll need to find the solar system's wormhole.
^The radar is also pinging something else. Maybe I'll investigate that too.
